page.title: List of township-level divisions of Henan

revisions.rev:
[[File:China Henan.svg|225px|thumb|right|Location of Henan province in China]]
This is a list of [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#Township level|township-level divisions]] of the province of [[Henan]], [[People's Republic of China]]. After [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#Province level|province]], [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#Prefecture level|prefecture]], and [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#County level|county-level]] divisions, township-level divisions constitute the formal fourth-level administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China. However, this is not the case with [[Jiyuan]] City, which, as a [[sub-prefecture-level city]], is also a [[county-level city]] under the direct administration of the provincial government; there township-level divisions form the ''third''-level administrative division. <!--There are a total of 1,023 such divisions in Jilin, divided into 252 [[Subdistrict (China)|subdistricts]], 427 [[Town (China)|towns]], 4 [[ethnic town]]s 312 [[Township (China)|townships]], and 28 ethnic townships.-->
{{clear}} {{Townships of the People's Republic of China sidebar}} <!--do NOT move Zhengzhou. It is the capital, so logically it should be first.--> <!-- please keep the District->City->County order-->
